SOURCE ID: Author/Org, Date, Info: Project Drawdown (2016), Average, calculated based on yield increase
Assumptions: Solution NPM = {Conventional NPM in USD per hectare/Conventional yield in Kg per hectare)*(Conventional yield in Kg per hectare*Solution yield gain in percentage per hectare). In this case used the average values for all of the used variables.
